attributes.action: Only close roads or sections of roads when there is actual work being done!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Roads are either closed or reduced by a lane due to roadworks. But most of the time they are sectioned off days before any work is done. I saw one 6 foot hole in an entire 400 foot stretch of road sectioned off. Closing or sectioning off roads unneccesary causes more traffic jams, more pollution and more stress. Please sort this out!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
